name: Happy Yak Neapolitan Spaghetti
description: A hearty classic that will have you thinking about the south of Italy.Ingredients: Pasta (wheat), Napolitana Sauce [tomato powder, soy protein, dehydrated vegetables (tomato, onion), skim milk powder, parmesan, maltodextrin, glucose solids, modified corn starch, hydrolyzed corn protein, salt, sugar, potato starch, caramel (sulphites), yeast extract, onion powder, garlic powder, spices, herbs, corn fiber, citric acid, artificial flavour], parmesan cheese, chili peppers.May contain: nut, peanuts, sesame, egg, fish, sea food, mustard.
